description: This file defines Data Access Object (DAO) interfaces for various entities (Contact, Deal, Task, Note) in a Room database for an Android application. Each DAO provides methods for CRUD operations and queries specific to their entity type.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all entities of the given type, ordered appropriately.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new entity into the database and returns its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing entity in the database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the specified entity from the database.

methods.name: notesFor
methods.description: Retrieves notes associated with a specific parent entity, filtered by type and ID.
